plugin.name: shoppingCart
plugin.title: Shopping Cart & Bidding
plugin.description: Allows users to pay and collect payments for listings and put up items at auction
plugin.author: Vladimir

emails.email:
Hello Administrator,
You've removed the order - "{order_key}". Order Details: {details} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

email.subject: Your order sold at {site_name} was removed

emails.email:
Hello {name},
The Administrator has removed your order - "{order_key}" at {site_name}.
Order Details:
{details}
______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

email.subject: Shipping status of your order changed at {site_name}

emails.email:
Hello {buyer},
The shipping status of your order (#{order_key}) has been changed to {status}.
______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {name},
Your order at {site_name} has been paid successfully.
Order Details:
{details}
______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

The order #{order_key} at {site_name} has been successfully paid.
Order Details:
{details}
______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {dealer_name},
Your auction at {site_name} has been canceled due to the absence of bids or because the highest bid failed to outbid the reserve price. You can renew the auction from your Account Area.
Details:
{details} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {dealer_name},
Your auction has been completed. {buyer} won the auction. Please give the winner some time to complete the transaction.
Details:
{details} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {name},
You've won the auction, please complete the transaction.
Owner: {owner}, Item: {item}, Total Price: {price}, Date: {date}
You may check the details at the link - {link} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {bidder_name},
Someone at {site_name} has outbid you at the auction.
Details:
Item: {item}, Your Last Bid: {your_last_bid}, Current Bid: {current_bid}, Date: {date}
Proceed to the auction - {link} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {name},
The automatic bidder outbid you at the auction.
Details:
Item: {item}, Your Last Bid: {your_last_bid}, Current Bid: {current_bid}, Date: {date}
Proceed to the auction - {link} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {name},
The auction where you bid has been updated. All your previous biddings at the auction have been canceled.
Details:
Item: {item} Starting Price: {start_price}, Start Date: {date} Duration: {days} Days
Proceed to the auction - {link} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {bidder_name},
The auction at {site_name} has been completed.
Details:
Item: {item}, Date: {date}
Proceed to the auction - {link} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {bidder},
You have canceled your bid at the auction.
Details:
Item: {item}, Date: {date}
Proceed to the auction - {link} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

email.subject: Bidder canceled his bid at your auction

emails.email:
Hello {dealer},
{bidder} has canceled his bid at your auction.
Details:
Item: {item}, Date: {date}
Proceed to the auction - {link} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {bidder},
You outbid at the auction because the user who offered the highest bid canceled his bid.
Details:
Item: {item}, Total: {total}, Date: {date}
Proceed to the auction - {link} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

email.subject: The auction at {site_name} closed ahead of time

emails.email:
Hello {buyer},
The auction at {site_name} has been closed ahead of time.
Details:
Item: {item}, Starting Price: {start_price}, Total Price: {price}, Date: {date}
Proceed to the auction - {link} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {buyer},
The seller has closed the auction at {site_name} ahead of time because you were the last and highest bidder. You've won the auction; please, complete the transaction.
Details:
Seller: {seller}, Item: {item}, Starting Price: {start_price}, Total Price: {price}, Date: {date}
You may check the details here - {link} ______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {name},
Your order at {site_name} has been successfully processed.
Order Details:
{details}
______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

The order #{order_key} at {site_name} has been successfully processed.
Order Details:
{details}
______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

Hello {seller},
Order #{order_key} at {site_name} confirmed
Order Details:
{details}
______________________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration

phrases.phrase: Commission will change after adding new bids
The item is not available, please contact the seller for more details.
You cannot add the item to the shopping cart.
You've added the item to the shopping cart.
You should pay for the order in the next 24 hours. Otherwise, the auction will be restarted.
Failed to add the item to the cart.
You've removed the item from the cart.
Failed to remove the item from the shopping cart.
The payment gateways and shipping methods are not set up.
Your bid is lower than the minimum one, please consider increasing it.
The tracking number has been added.
Failed to update the tracking number.
Failed to update the delivery status.
The Shopping Cart is not available to your account type.
Selected price format {price_format} not available to your account type
For example, Country > State > City > address
You've updated the shipping method settings.
Convert other currencies to the system one in the checkout step
Are you sure you want to convert listing prices to the system currency?
Do you want to add the item to the shopping cart?
Are you sure you want to empty your cart?
Are you sure you want to remove the item from the cart?
Add a rate for a location

Thank you for your purchase! Your payment has gone through. After confirming the payment, the seller will send the item(s) to your address. You may track the delivery status of your order from My Orders.

Thank you for purchasing the product(s)! The seller will send
the item(s) to your address after confirming your payment.
As you enabled the 'Allow the system currency only' option, listing prices will be converted to the system currency.
You may set a discount for a certain amount of products.
The auction is closed or has expired.
Are you sure you want to bid?
Please [log in] or [sign up] to start bidding.
You cannot bid at your auction.
Are you sure you want to cancel the bid?
The seller hasn't yet set up the payment gateway. Please contact the seller for resolving the issue.
The service is unavailable. Please consider using another service.
The seller hasn't yet set up the {method} shipping method. Please contact the seller for resolving the issue.
You don't have access to the content.
If you cancel updating the ads you won't be able to enable the shopping cart for the existing listings. Are you sure you want to proceed?
You have {count} listings. Click [here] to enable the shopping cart for the listings or click [cancel] if don't need the option.
Please don't close the page until updating is complete.
Updating is in process, please wait.
Please specify your state code in ISO format (for example, NY)
Please specify your city in English (for example, Brooklyn)
Please specify your address in English (for example, 244 Sumpter St, Brooklyn, NY 11233, USA)
Are you sure you want to close the auction?
Are you sure you want to mark the order as paid?
The payment status has been changed to paid.
The cash option is unavailable for the seller.
The auction is still active; you can't edit the details.
The Price field doesn\'t exist in the listing table; please, add the field from the Listing Field manager and enable it on the listing form.
You've already added the product to the cart.
You should install and set up a payment gateway with split payment option (stripe or YooKassa) to enable the commission
You can't download the file; the order is not paid
You should install and set up a payment gateway with payment escrow option (ecrow, stripe or YooKassa) to enable the safe deal
Are you sure you want to confirm the order?
Are you sure you want to cancel the order
Please, [contact the seller] to get a more accurate pickup address.

Thank you for purchasing the product(s)!
The seller will contact you to discuss payment options and clarify delivery details.
Please stay reachable.

config.name: Standard Ad
config.description: The option allows you to disable posting standard ads on the site.

config.name: Recipient of payments
config.description: Administrator - payments will be sent to the Administrator; Seller - payments will be sent to sellers

config.name: Visible number of items in cart
Currency RSS feed
config.description: You might need to edit REGEXP rules in the code if you want to change the setting.

config.name: Automatic bid
config.description: The option allows you to bid at auction in auto mode within a fixed period.
Select the account type(s) that will be allowed to sell items using the Shopping Cart & Bidding plugin.

config.name: Show listings with no stock to sell
Commission type
config.description: Calculate % of an item price and set a flat commission.

config.name: Add commission to a seller's price
config.description: The option allows you to set a commission on sales, which is calculated when adding a listing. A commission is either added or dedicated from an item price.

config.name: Position of tabs on the listing form
Warehouse address fields
config.description: Sellers will need to fill out the fields on the Add/Edit Listing pages so that buyers could pick up bought items at the address.

config.name: Shipping step on the order processing page
config.description: Allows buyers to select a delivery method and enter a delivery address; if disabled, only the pickup option will be available.

config.name: Allow buyers to remove the last bid
Use Multifield plugin on shipping form
config.description: Enabling the plugin allows your users to simplify filling out data in the location fields.

config.name: Allow to check escrow steps without create real actions in payment gateway
